1.title: Personal Transport
1.plot: In a future where fossil fuels are two dirty words, scientists and designers across Asia engage in a billion-dollar race to build cars that are safe to the environment, highly efficient and still have the looks of design dynamites. How will the world as we know it change?

2.title: Communications
2.plot: From smoke signals to pigeons and telegraphs to telephones, communication technology is constantly advancing, keeping our world closer together and defining our culture. But in an era that has given us revolutionary breakthroughs such as the Internet and the Smartphone ... what could possibly come next?

3.title: Cities and Homes
3.plot: Cities of the future will face an onslaught of challenges - from climate change to population growth - so today's scientists, engineers, and innovators have no choice but to shift radically their way of thinking, building, growing the future city. How will our homes and cities be transformed?
